About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

From a very young age I was interested in tech when all we had to play with was small radios, Now we have computers so have naturally progressed where today.

I am a native maori who loves my country and a programmer with a passion for business and getting your business or app idea up and running with the view of always learning new technologies.

The Engineer

Full Stack Developer

I have worked with current technologies such as the latest versions of Javascript, React with redux, Handlebars, Styled Components along with HTML and CSS on the front-end and node.js with express and SQLite etc on the back-end.

The Designer

Front End Developer

The part the customer sees is only just the beginning but with technologies such as HTML 5, CSS 3, material UI and SASS you can build exquisite things of beauty on the screen.

The Imagineer

Graphic Designer

A digital designer is the culmination of a good eye and natural artistic qualities which involve imagination and sometimes pushing the envelope a bit until it becomes art.
